rows.label: bf04120190_0010
rows.name:
So you see, considering the situation,
could you let them off the hook?

rows.label: bf04120190_0020
rows.name:
Hmmm. I'd hate to deny a request from you, Rex,
and I can see these kids've had a hard time...

rows.label: bf04120190_0040
rows.name: Well, the ship did come back safely...

rows.label: bf04120190_0050
rows.name: I don't know if this makes up for it, but...

rows.label: bf04120190_0060
rows.name:
Make them work for the Guild, and get them
to work off what they owe that way?

rows.label: bf04120190_0090
rows.name:
Are you saying...we should
make salvagers of them?

rows.label: bf04120190_0100
rows.name:
I think they have potential.
They're also dexterous with their hands... right?

rows.label: bf04120190_0110
rows.name:
Come on, you know it makes sense.
They're poor little orphans with nowhere to go!

rows.label: bf04120190_0120
rows.name: Are you really just gonna turn them away?

rows.label: bf04120190_0130
rows.name:
You sure know how to twist a guy's arm...
All right, I'll do it!

rows.label: bf04120190_0150
rows.name:
But it's just bed and board for now, got that?
If you want paying, you prove yourselves first!

rows.label: bf04120190_0160
rows.name:
You hear that?
I hope you don't mind...
